title: Seoul Live Updates: As Nation Mourns, a Focus on How a Festive Night Turned Deadly
description: A crowd surge during a Halloween celebration in a nightlife district killed more than 150 people. Witnesses say police presence was scant, even though people were thronging the streets.
dc:creator: The New York Times
media:credit: Chang W. Lee/The New York Times
media:description: A man bowed to the memorial for the victims of stempede in Itaewon, Seoul, on Oct. 30th, 2022, in Seoul, South Korea.
